Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
October 2022 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Welcome to another edition of The Justia Insider! Once more, autumn has come, and we are ready for tons of spooky fun this coming Halloween! Don’t miss the chance to participate in the Justia Ghoulies Awards. As always, horribly awesome prizes are waiting for the Justia family. We hope you all have a great month!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Business Contracts Clauses: We pushed live a new section in Justia Business Contracts that keeps track of individual clauses and organizes them by category, making it easier for our users to analyze and contrast specific clauses across different contracts.

Justia Elevate QA Automation: The QA Team released the automated QA jobs to ensure the quality of the Justia Elevate WordPress interface. We are moving forward with additional features and making sure our system remains active and functional.

Jenkins Migrations: Our QA Automation and IT Teams upgraded their development infrastructure to the latest version and migrated Jenkins. This software runs and coordinates automated QA jobs to a standalone infrastructure.

Justia Lawyer Directory Claiming System (Improved Tracking): We updated our JLD claiming process to add tracking methods to obtain additional insights into our users' patterns and behaviors while claiming a JLD profile.

NFS Storage System: In the backend, our projects communicate through shared file storage servers named NFS. Our IT Team updated all NFS connections to optimize time and cost this month.

Justia Connect Pro (Analytics Report): This report will provide insights into the actions of Justia Connect Pro members before and after they purchase the Pro membership.

First Short Video for Social Media: Members of our Editorial, Design, and Marketing Teams produced and published the first short video on social networks as part of our legal content marketing strategy in Mexico.

Integrating Spark with Tableau: Our Data Team connected Tableau, a data visualization system that we use to analyze and present data research and reports, with Spark, a service to process large amounts of data from different sources. This connection will expand our ability to integrate and analyze datasets that are otherwise independent of each other.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • Additional Content for Justia US Law Schools Center. We added resources to the Justia US Law Schools Center that will cover issues such as taking exams in law schools, preparing study outlines, and paying for law school through student loans and scholarships.
  • New 50-State Surveys. We wrote 50-state surveys on medical malpractice lawsuits for the Medical Malpractice center, simplified procedures for small estates for the Probate center, workers’ compensation benefits for the Workers’ Compensation center, and election laws and procedures for the Civil Rights and Discrimination center. More 50-state surveys are underway.
  • Additional Snippets. We have improved the accessibility and clarity of the Consumer Protection center by writing more snippets underlining critical points in this area.

NEW TEAM MEMBERS

Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

Antonio Gonzalez

Front-end Team Intern

Hello! I am Antonio González. I'm 19 years old and was born in Saltillo, Coahuila, but when I was 12, I moved to Zacatecas. Currently, I'm a Software Engineering student at the Autonomous University of Zacatecas. Listening to music is my favorite hobby, making me more creative and relaxed, so I use headphones 80% of the time. I watch movies, study technology-related topics, and play video games in my free time.

Daniel Monroy

Front-end Team

Hello! I am Daniel Monroy, a Front End Developer born in La Paz, Baja California Sur. I like learning new technologies, and my goal is to keep growing in my profession. I like video games, sports, and music and can talk about almost any topic.

Antonio Leyva

Design Team

Hello! I am Antonio Leyva. I am from Monterrey, and I am 29 years old. I have a degree in Graphic Design. I am keen on history, historical revisionism, and sports. Generally speaking, my favorite might be soccer, but I also feel attracted to team sports such as baseball and basketball. I love playing FIFA and Age of Empires.

TEAM ACTIVITY

Justia’s Got Talent

On September 23rd, we had our pilot episode of Justia's Got Talent show! At the beginning of the event, we had a surprise cameo of American Idol legend William Hung wishing all participants good luck. We enjoyed all the entertaining and thrilling performances. Thank you very much for your participation! The event wouldn't have been the same without you. We are looking forward to having another exciting event soon!

JUSTIA PET NEWS

Baby Mika and Caring Laila

Mika, the Boxer, is four months old and the newest member of Arturo's Family. Laila, the Dogue de Bordeaux, is six years old, and she welcomed Mika with her paws wide open. Both like to sleep together, play tug-of-war, chase the ball and wrestle until Laila growls because Mika bites her. But most of the time, they are just two lovely BFFs spending time together!
